title: Sunny, private room in Brooklyn!
location: Room in Brooklyn, New York, United States
description: This is a small, cozy room with a very comfortable bed!   Enjoy your stay in this welcoming space.The spaceLooking for a bright cozy bedroom?    I've got just the space for you!  There is a place to read, study or sleep on the very comfortable bed.Guest accessShare the open kitchen and living spaces with me and other house guests.   There is plenty of room to spread out and relax after your day in the city.   I've been a host to international students for many years and have plenty of ideas for you to enjoy the city on a budget.Other things to noteI have a dog and enjoy a friendly, open, gay friendly and non-smoking environment.Registration DetailsOSE-STRREG-0000572
